page.shortlink: api inet namespace uploaded file class save to file method

argument.name: DestinationFile
argument.description: The name of the file to create or append to on the server.

argument.name: Append
argument.description: Default = .F.. If .t. and the file exists on the server, data will be appended to the file. If .F., the file will be overwritten.

return.name: Result
return.description: Returns .T. if the operation succeeds, otherwise .F. (see .CallResult for additional error information.)

page.description: Save the data to the storage member requested
page.example:
function uploadFile as L (FileToUpload as INET::UploadedFile) dim Filepath as c = "C:\myapp\data\uploadedFiles\\"
uploaded = FileToUpload.SaveToFile(Filepath + FileToUpload.Filename) end if

ref.link: server a5w uploading files to the application server

see.ref: Uploading Files to the Application Server (using an HTML form)
